description.value: The extent of your corruption devastates your foes' minds and reflexes. When you use @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.feats-srd.Item.Cruelty], you can choose to make the target @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Clumsy] or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Stupefied] instead, with the same condition value. Make the choice when you Cast the Spell (before you know the result of the target's save)
